CustomField.description: Days of the week the route is performed
CustomField.formula: IF(Monday__c, "Mon ","") + IF(Tuesday__c, "Tue ","") + IF(Wednesday__c, "Wed ","") + IF(Thursday__c, "Thu ","") + IF(Friday__c, "Fri ","") + IF(Saturday__c, "Sat ","") + IF(Sunday__c, "Sun ","")
CustomField.label: Active Duty Days
